meanings.definition: A small cube-shaped device containing flashbulbs used in photography.
meanings.sent1: The photographer attached the flashcube to the camera before taking the picture.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new flashcube for my vintage camera to improve the lighting in my photos.
meanings.sent3: When the flashcube started flashing unexpectedly, everyone in the room was momentarily blinded.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a flashcube, bright and dazzling.
meanings.sent5: The flashcube illuminated the dark room, capturing the moment in a burst of light.

meanings.definition: To flash or shine brightly in a cube-like shape.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks display will flashcube in the night sky, mesmerizing the audience.
meanings.sent2: The disco ball seemed to flashcube in time with the music, creating a dazzling effect.
meanings.sent3: As the magician waved his wand, the cards began to flashcube in a magical display.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes seemed to flashcube with excitement as she opened the gift.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse on the cliff would flashcube every few seconds, guiding ships safely to shore.
